ISSUE.TITLE: Rename Main class
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This is an inconvenient name since jps just lists it as Main instead of as kafka-rest, and it gets confusing if you're also running schema-registry. We'll need to maintain the Main class for compatibility, but we should change all usages (e.g. in scripts) to the new class.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge branch 'restutils-updates' * restutils-updates: Deprecate `connections-accepted-rate` Update junit version to match `rest-utils`
